Declare @vchSQL varchar(max) Declare @bigsql varchar(max)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[Usp_Report_IncludeExcludeLoanSummary]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[Usp_Report_IncludeExcludeLoanSummary] ' exec (@vchSQL)
--************************************************** --Usp_Report_FailedLoanSummary --************************************************** Set @vchSQL ='CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Usp_Report_IncludeExcludeLoanSummary] @DimPoolId bigint AS BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON Declare @ColumnList TABLE ( ColumnName nvarchar(500) ) Declare @SqlCMDHeader nvarchar(max) Declare @strColumnList nvarchar(max)='''''''' Declare @strColumn nvarchar(500)='''''''' Declare @UploadId bigint Select @UploadId = UploadId From dbo.tblDimPool Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId
Insert Into @ColumnList Select '''',['''' + Ltrim(Rtrim(CriteriaName)) + '''']'''' From dbo.tblDimEC Where DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And IsEnabled = 1 And CriteriaName Not In ( ''''ECT1_Targeting_Parent'''',''''ECT2_Targeting_Size'''',''''LoansInclusion'''') And CriteriaTableTypeCode = ''''dbo.tblFactLoanECResult'''' Order By DimECID
DECLARE tableCursor CURSOR FOR Select * From @ColumnList FOR READ ONLY --Open the cursor OPEN tableCursor --Get the first table name from the cursor FETCH NEXT FROM tableCursor INTO @strColumn
--Loop until the cursor was not able to fetch WHILE (@@Fetch_Status >= 0) BEGIN Set @strColumnList = @strColumnList + @strColumn FETCH NEXT FROM tableCursor INTO @strColumn END
--Get rid of the cursor CLOSE tableCursor DEALLOCATE tableCursor
Set @strColumnList = RIGHT(@strColumnList, LEN(@strColumnList) - 1)
Set @SqlCMDHeader ='''' SELECT AccountNo , IsInclude , IsAuditLoan , IsInPool , CurrentPrincipalBalance , #ECColumns# From ( Select ufd.AccountNo , ufd.AuditLoan as IsAuditLoan , Case When ufd.Included = 1 then ''''''''Include'''''''' When ufd.Included = 0 then ''''''''Exclude'''''''' Else ''''''''UNK'''''''' End As IsInclude , FL.CurrentPrincipalBalance , Case When FL.IsIncluded = 1 then ''''''''In'''''''' Else ''''''''Not In'''''''' End As IsInPool , Ltrim(Rtrim(EC.CriteriaName)) As CriteriaName From dbo.tblUploadedFileDetails ufd Left Join dbo.tblFactLoan FL On FL.DimPoolID = #PoolID# And FL.AccountNo = ufd.AccountNo Left Join dbo.tblFactLoanECResult FLEC ON FLEC.DimPoolID = FL.DimPoolID And FLEC.DimLoanID = FL.DimLoanID Left Join dbo.tblDimEC EC on EC.DimPoolID = FLEC.DimPoolID And EC.DimECID = FLEC.DimECID Where ufd.UploadID = #UploadId# And ufd.AuditLoan <> 1
Union
Select ufd.AccountNo , ufd.AuditLoan as IsAuditLoan , Case When ufd.Included = 1 then ''''''''Include'''''''' When ufd.Included = 0 then ''''''''Exclude'''''''' Else ''''''''UNK'''''''' End As IsInclude , FL.CurrentPrincipalBalance , Case When FL.IsIncluded = 1 then ''''''''In'''''''' Else ''''''''Not In'''''''' End As IsInPool , Ltrim(Rtrim(EC.CriteriaName)) As CriteriaName From dbo.tblUploadedFileDetails ufd Left Join dbo.tblFactLoan FL On FL.DimPoolID = #PoolID# And FL.AccountNo = ufd.AccountNo Left Join dbo.tblFactIncludedAuditLoanECResult FLEC ON FLEC.DimPoolID = FL.DimPoolID And FLEC.DimLoanID = FL.DimLoanID Left Join dbo.tblDimEC EC on EC.DimPoolID = FLEC.DimPoolID And EC.DimECID = FLEC.DimECID Where ufd.UploadID = #UploadId# And ufd.AuditLoan = 1
) LoanECResult
PIVOT ( Count(CriteriaName) -- Note this MAX is the MAX of a single value so no issue FOR CriteriaName IN ( #ECColumns# ) )LoanECResult_Pivot -- Pivot Table Order By IsInclude, IsAuditLoan, IsInPool, AccountNo ''''
Set @SqlCMDHeader = REPLACE(@SqlCMDHeader, ''''#ECColumns#'''', @strColumnList) Set @SqlCMDHeader = REPLACE(@SqlCMDHeader, ''''#PoolID#'''', CONVERT(nvarchar(10), @DimPoolId)) Set @SqlCMDHeader = REPLACE(@SqlCMDHeader, ''''#UploadId#'''', CONVERT(nvarchar(10), @UploadId))
EXEC sp_executesql @SqlCMDHeader
End ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @BigSQL EXEC (@BigSQL)
